body.name: Amazon Basics 5 Cup Coffee Maker with Reusable Filter, Black and Stainless Steel

features: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted
CONVENIENT-5-cup coffee maker with warming plate ideal for homes, apartments, dorm rooms, or work spaces
EASY OPERATION-Just press the ON/OFF switch to brew and enjoy flavorful coffee in minutes. ON/OFF indicator light lets you know when your coffee maker is on or off
KEEP WARM-Stain-resistant warming plate keeps coffee warm until you turn it off, ensuring every cup you drink is hot coffee
Overheating and dry-boil protection function: no water in the water tank or the temperature exceeds the rated temperature will stop brewing and enter the dry-boil protection
Visible water window-allowing you to see how much water is being added for precision measuring and overflow prevention
REUSABLE FILTER-Removable, reusable filter basket can be easily lifted out for disposal and cleaning
PAUSE & SERVE FEATURE-Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause stops cycle if you need a cup before brewing is finished
COMPACT SIZE-Compact size saves space on your countertop
body.description: Product Description CONVENIENT-5-cup coffee maker with warming plate ideal for homes, apartments, dorm rooms, or work spaces EASY OPERATION-Just press the ON/OFF switch to brew and enjoy flavorful coffee in minutes. productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 5,886 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #633 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #12 in Coffee Machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly as advertised. BUT, it makes slightly less than 5 cups. Probably 4 3/4 cups. Any amount of water above the pot's 5-cup line WILL result in a overflow onto your kitchen counter. No big deal.The included mesh filter works great! And it IS BETTER FLAVOR without the paper taste.This brews faster than the Mr. Coffee. The Mr. Coffee claims a automatic shutoff that it doesn't have. This brewer also has no auto shutoff but it doesn't claim to either.The temperature of the brewed coffee is hot enough that you will sip with caution.....Same with the coffee kept warm......This does have a glass pot...So don't drop it.This is good bang for the buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this coffee maker daily for a few weeks now, it's super easy to set up and use. It even includes a reusable filter. I gave it a brisk wash and ran a plain water cycle before making an actual coffee as suggested. The first coffee had a bit of a packaging smell but after that it was all coffee smells and taste. Maybe if I washed it more thoroughly that wouldn't have happened but in the end it's all good. I totally endorse this coffee maker as a perfectly good old skool style maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes Good Coffee
reviews.reviewText: It's a simple basic coffee maker. No fancy functions like automatic shut off, etc but it makes great coffee and so inexpensive. And looks good too. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 day burnt coffee stain cleaned like a miracle
reviews.reviewText: I would love to know what kind of glass was used in that pot because it looked cheap and sounded cheap when tapped, but that thick burned-in stain practically rinsed away without needing any real scrubbing. Just a small wipe and it was practically cleaner than an angel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 5Cup?? Maybe in France
reviews.reviewText: This is a compact coffee maker that is easy to use and clean, but it only makes 10 ounces of coffee. So the maker is definitely not abiding by the 8 ounce cup definition. Seems this is false advertising, but, since it fills my 12 ounce mug I can live with it. If you are a coffee fanantic you should keep shopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A bit better than expected. Comes well-packaged, with instructions, no flaws, item as described. Carafe is wider, so it's easy to wash. I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but effective.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. Coffee pot size for two. People or one person. I like it. It's not too big. I drink coffee by myself in the morning, so it's nice to not have to make a huge part of coffee. I'd say you can get 2- 12 oz. cups of coffee out of them easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker for those who don't need 12 cups
reviews.reviewText: I do like this product but as some of the reviews stated, it does dribble some when filling the water chamber and does dribble when pouring your cup. I can easily overlook these drawbacks. It's great for making brewed coffee for one or two.

reviews.reviewTitle: In terms of quality, the coffee maker is sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The purchase of this coffee maker was mainly for the garage. Overall, the experience with this coffee maker was positive. The ease of use is a big positive, and the reusable filter is a great option for reducing waste.In terms of quality, the coffee maker is sturdy. To get the most out of this coffee maker, I recommend rinsing the reusable filter immediately after each use for easy cleaning later. If you're looking for a coffee maker for the garage like me, this one gets the job done with no frills.

Por el precio cuenta con mejor tamaño y calidad de materiales que otras del mercado. Es muy fácil de armar y utilizar. En pocos minutos prepara un par de tazas (las medidas estándar son de 240 ml aprox.). Con 15 g de café molido prepara 4 tazas o 2 de las convencionales. Es importante leer bien cómo limpiarla con agua y vinagre blanco antes del primer uso.

If you are looking for a small coffee machine this is the one for you! Makes great coffee and the quantity is perfect for 1 up to 2 people! Is compact and fits perfectly if you don’t have much room! So far I love it!
Everything I hoped for at a great price. Does not have auto shut-off is all. But you may not even want that.
El filtro de la cafetera es de malla delgada esta delgada y frágil
